Description: Reverend Reeves Gabrels Signature Condition: This Reeves Gabrels signature is in great shape! Serial Number: 28695 Weight: 8.20lbs The Reeves Gabrels Signature guitar was designed in collaboration with The Cure's artist himself, loaded with Railhammer Chisel pickups for truly revolutionary tone. This versatile guitar features a korina solid body, maple neck with a medium oval profile, and Reverend pin-lock tuners - much like many other Reverend guitars. It also boasts some unique features, such as a a toggle switch that can be rotated to different angles, up-route underneath the tremolo for extra travel, and a push-pull phase switch (in the tone control) to push tonal boundaries. Features & Technical Specs: Body Wood: Korina solidbody Body Color/Finish: Metallic Red Neck Wood: Maple, satin amber finish Neck Profile: Medium oval Neck Radius: 12" Neck Joint: Bolt on Fingerboard: Rosewood Fingerboard Inlays: Dots Frets: 22 medium jumbo Nut: Boneite Nut Width: 43mm Tuners: Reverend pin-lock Scale Length: 25.5" Bridge: Wilkinson WVS50 IIK tremolo Pickups: Railhammer Chisel Controls: Volume, Tone, Bass Contour, 3-way Jack Location: Side Hardware Finish: Chrome Case: Not included Country Of Origin: South Korea Switching: 3-way pickup selector: P1 - Bridge pickup P2 - Bridge & neck pickup P3 - Neck pickup
